doc:
Darry Cowl https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Darry_Cowl 0 Darry Cowl (born André Darricau; 27 August 1925 – 14 February 2006) was a French actor and musician. He won a César Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role in 2004 for his role as a concierge in Pas sur la bouche (Not on the lips), which was his last appearance. He was born in Vittel and came to prominence when he was cast by Sacha Guitry in Assassins et voleurs (1956) (Assassins and Robbers). Following this he turned to acting in cinema roles and soon gained celebrity status with his role as Antoine Péralou in Le Triporteur (1957) (The Tricycle). A game addict, he often acted only for money in films that did not stretch his acting ability. He explained this by noting he did not read the script (or, on occasion, know the title) of the work in which he was to act. He played Major Archibald in the 1974 film Don't Touch the White Woman!. He had hoped to return to theatre acting in Hold Up in September 2005 but ill-health prevented this. At age 80, he died in Neuilly-sur-Seine from complications of lung cancer. Darry_Cowl ( born André_Darricau ; 27_August_1925 – 14_February_2006 ) was a_French_actor_and_musician . He won a_César_Award for_Best_Actor in a_Supporting_Role in 2004 for his_role as a_concierge in Pas_sur_la_bouche ( Not on the_lips_) , which was his_last_appearance . He was_born in Vittel and came to prominence when he was_cast by Sacha_Guitry in Assassins_et_voleurs ( 1956_)_(_Assassins_and_Robbers_) . Following this he turned to acting in cinema_roles and soon_gained celebrity_status with his_role as Antoine_Péralou in Le_Triporteur_(_1957_) ( The_Tricycle_) . A_game_addict , he often acted only for money in films that did_not_stretch his_acting_ability . He explained this by noting he did_not_read the_script_( or , on occasion , know the_title_) of the_work in which he was_to_act . He played Major_Archibald in the_1974_film Do_n't_Touch the_White_Woman ! . He had_hoped_to_return to theatre_acting in Hold_Up in September_2005 but ill-health prevented this . At age_80 , he died in Neuilly-sur-Seine from complications of lung_cancer .
